episodes.title: Ep. 33 - General Conference Recap
episodes.description:
TW: Mentions of abortion
We just wanna say thank you SO much to our listeners for your patience! It's been a hot minute since we've put out a new episode--we actually recorded this one WEEKS ago and then life threw a bunch of curveballs, so we're just finally getting it out. Enjoy this super cringey recap of the church's April 2025 General Conference.
subjects: The Church Of Jesus Christ Of Latter-Day Saints

episodes.title: Ep. 32 - The perks of being a man (Chris's Exit Story)
episodes.description: Join us as our new friend Chris details his introduction & exit from the church along with all the perks that come with being a man in the church.
subjects: The Church Of Jesus Christ Of Latter-Day Saints

episodes.title: Ep. 31 - Angel Moroni's Visitations
episodes.description:
Join us as we continue to tell the tale of the restoration as told by J$ (Joseph Smith) himself.
SOURCES:
Churchofjesuschrist.org 
mormonr.org
subjects: The Church Of Jesus Christ Of Latter-Day Saints

episodes.title: Ep. 30 - Am I the asshole?
episodes.description:
TW: Mentions of verbal abuse, sexual assault, and homophobia
Join us as we read AITA stories from Redditt...Mormon style! 
Let us know if you'd like more AITA episodes! Maybe we'll make it a series!
subjects: The Church Of Jesus Christ Of Latter-Day Saints

episodes.title: Ep. 29 - Joseph Smith's First Vision
episodes.description:
In this episode we discuss the origin story of the church along with the incongruencies in Joseph's writings about the "First Vision." 
SOURCES: churchofjesuschrist.orgcesletter.org
subjects: The Church Of Jesus Christ Of Latter-Day Saints

episodes.title: Ep. 28 - Mormon Cringe (PART TWO)
episodes.description: It's been a hot minute, but we're finally back with PART TWO of our Mormon Cringe series! This one is primarily about cringey experiences we had in the dating world as Mormons. Buckle up!
subjects: The Church Of Jesus Christ Of Latter-Day Saints

episodes.title: Ep. 27 - What makes a cult? (PART TWO)
episodes.description:
TW: Mentions of cult behavior, homophobia, transphobia, abuse, and suicide
2/2 - In this two part series we go over a list of qualifiers for cults and discuss how Mormonism fits within them.
SOURCES:The International Authority on Cults & Coercion
churchofjesuschrist.org
wasmormon.org
Seductive Poison by Deborah Layton
subjects: The Church Of Jesus Christ Of Latter-Day Saints
Cult Psychology

episodes.title: Ep. 22 - "Have you heard of the Church of Gay?"
episodes.description:
TW: Mentions of homophobia and transphobia
Gender roles in the church are FELT!! Come along with us as we discuss the gender binary, gender roles, and homophobia that is ever present in the Mormon church. 
SOURCES: 
The Family: A Proclamation to the World
Latter Gay Stories
churchofjesuschrist.org
subjects: The Church Of Jesus Christ Of Latter-Day Saints

episodes.title: Ep. 21 - Giving or greedy?
episodes.description:
Come along with us as we dive into the church's financial situation and unpack where that money is really going. 
Sources:
https://thewidowsmite.org/2023update/
https://universe.byu.edu/2023/12/13/light-the-world-encourages-people-to-spread-light-and-service-this-christmas-season/#:~:text=Light%20the%20World%20began%20as,Christ%2C%20according%20to%20Church%20Newsroom%20
subjects: The Church Of Jesus Christ Of Latter-Day Saints

episodes.title: Ep. 20 - In and Out: Called to be Queer
episodes.description: Kage shares their story of meeting the missionaries and feeling like she was living a double life as she explored Mormonism in their early 20s.
subjects: The Church Of Jesus Christ Of Latter-Day Saints

episodes.title: Ep. 19 - "I'm wearing Crocs to Mass."
episodes.description: TW: Mentions of emotional abuse and cult behavior Our special guest Em shares their story of growing up Catholic, exploring another church during college, and ultimately deciding that religion is just not for them.
subjects: Catholicism
The Church Of Jesus Christ Of Latter-Day Saints

episodes.title: Ep. 18 - "I felt like I was pushed out." (PART TWO)
episodes.description: TW: Mentions of sexual assault, pornography, depression, anxiety, and abuse Karina's sister Sarah shares her story of trying desperately to hold onto the church and the struggles she faced as she was eventually pushed out.
subjects: The Church Of Jesus Christ Of Latter-Day Saints

episodes.title: Ep. 17 - "I felt like I was pushed out." (PART ONE)

episodes.title: Ep. 16 - The Origin of Halloween
episodes.description: Things got a little spooky on this week's episode as we discuss the origin of Halloween and how we experienced it as Mormons. SOURCES Library of Congress: https://www.history.com/news/halloween-samhain-celts-catholic-church https://blogs.loc.gov/headlinesandheroes/2021/10/the-origins-of-halloween-traditions/#:~:text=Yet%2C%20the%20Halloween%20holiday%20has,costumes%20to%20ward%20off%20ghosts The History Channel Grace to You: https://www.gty.org/library/articles/A123/christians-and-halloween A study by Lifeway: https://news.lifeway.com/2015/10/26/lifeway-research-halloween-2015/#:~:text=Religious%20differences,'%20good.%E2%80%9D%20McConnell%20said LDS Living: https://www.ldsliving.com/what-the-church-has-said-about-halloween/s/86783 Women Seeking Christ: https://womenseekingchrist.org/2021/10/31/do-latter-day-saints-celebrate-halloween/ Quora: https://www.quora.com/How-do-Mormons-battle-evil-spirits-demons-and-bad-energy Church Website: https://www.churchofjesuschrist.org/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/129?lang=eng#title_number1 Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/mormon/comments/15wu6qm/since_mormons_believe_in_demonic_possession_are/
subjects: The Church Of Jesus Christ Of Latter-Day Saints
Catholicism

episodes.title: Ep. 15 - Struck by lightning & turned evil!
episodes.description: TW: Mentions of eating disorders & addiction Sammi's BFF Lily joins us to share her story & give a little insight on the church's health code ✨The Word of Wisdom✨
subjects: The Church Of Jesus Christ Of Latter-Day Saints

episodes.title: Ep. 14 - General Conference Recap (PART TWO)
episodes.description: TW: As many of you know, General Conference is pretty jam-packed with content that can be quite triggering in various ways. Please take care to only listen if you're in a good headspace and allow yourself time to process if needed. We're here for you. 2/2 - We did some digging through the talks given at the church's Semi-Annual General Conference the first weekend in October...the discussion continues. SOURCE YouTube: @churchofjesuschristgeneralconf - October 2024 General Conference
subjects: The Church Of Jesus Christ Of Latter-Day Saints

episodes.title: Ep. 13 - General Conference Recap (PART ONE)
episodes.description: TW: As many of you know, General Conference is pretty jam-packed with content that can be quite triggering in various ways. Please take care to only listen if you're in a good headspace and allow yourself time to process if needed. We're here for you. 1/2 - We did some digging through the talks given at the church's Semi-Annual General Conference last weekend...there's a lot to discuss. SOURCES YouTube: @churchofjesuschristgeneralconf - October 2024 General Conference Instagram: @nemothemormon
subjects: The Church Of Jesus Christ Of Latter-Day Saints

episodes.title: Ep. 12 - Pelted by coins for the cause!
episodes.description: TW - Mentions of racism and suicide Our special guest Daryl shares his story of traveling hours with his family to participate in the church in rural Australia as a child. After raising children in the church, his move to the USA, and marriage to a Never-Mo, started his questioning & eventual exit from the church.
subjects: The Church Of Jesus Christ Of Latter-Day Saints

episodes.title: Ep. 11 - "You can just not be an asshole."
episodes.description: TW: Discussion of transphobia & homophobia. The church recently made a policy change around transgender people and their involvement in the church. We're here to fill you in and rage about it.
subjects: The Church Of Jesus Christ Of Latter-Day Saints

episodes.title: Ep. 10 - "Fuck yeah, monkey! Go off!" (PART THREE)
episodes.description: TW: Mentions of sexual assault, abuse, neglect, and suicide. Part 3/3 - Alice wraps up her story by sharing how she discovered her gender identity and sexuality, and what it took to accept herself despite religious conditioning and opposition from family.
subjects: The Church Of Jesus Christ Of Latter-Day Saints

episodes.title: Ep. 9 - "Fuck yeah, monkey! Go off!" (PART TWO)
episodes.description: TW: Mentions of sexual assault, abuse, neglect, and suicide. Part 2/3 - Our guest Alice continues her story of clinging to religion even while questioning it as she faces hardships that no one should have to face.
subjects: The Church Of Jesus Christ Of Latter-Day Saints

episodes.title: Ep. 8 - "Fuck yeah, monkey! Go off!" (PART ONE)
episodes.description: TW: Mentions of sexual assault, abuse, neglect, and suicide. Part 1/3 - Our guest Alice shares her story of growing up in an rigid Protestant household and what it was like to start questioning everything she believed after having an honest chat with an atheist.
subjects: The Church Of Jesus Christ Of Latter-Day Saints

episodes.title: Ep. 7 - A Vocabulary Lesson (PART TWO)
episodes.description: A continuation of last week's episode, we continue to explain the ins-and-outs of Mormon terminology. We're still blown away at how long this took us to record! And I'm sure we'll think of other random words as we keep creating content for our lovely listeners!
subjects: The Church Of Jesus Christ Of Latter-Day Saints

episodes.title: Ep. 6 - A Vocabulary Lesson (PART ONE)
episodes.description: There's a whole long list of words that are exclusive to/have exclusive meanings in the Mormon Church! We're here to make sense of it all! Stay tuned for part two!! When we say there are a LOT of words, we mean A LOT!!
subjects: The Church Of Jesus Christ Of Latter-Day Saints

episodes.title: Ep. 5 - Three Months a Mormon
episodes.description: TW: Mentions of suicide -- we give a trigger warning for potential mentions of self harm and eating disorders in the recording as well, but those topics did not come up. Devyn, OUR FIRST GUEST EVER, shares her experience converting to Mormonism during her young adulthood just to be immediately blindsided by things that are kept "hush-hush" in the church.
subjects: The Church Of Jesus Christ Of Latter-Day Saints

episodes.title: Ep. 4 - Mormon Cringe (PART ONE)
episodes.description: Last week's episode was HEAVY, so we're here to bring you some more lighthearted, hilarious content as we talk about a bunch of random, super cringey things we experienced as youth in the Mormon church. More to come ;) Be on the lookout for PART TWO. We referenced a song in the episode, but couldn't remember who it was by. It's Everclean/Sons of Provo...here's a link to the song for your listening pleasure: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-0-WQ5W8NW8
subjects: The Church Of Jesus Christ Of Latter-Day Saints

episodes.title: Ep. 3 - "I'm hooked on the gay."
episodes.description: TW: Mentions of homophobia, transphobia, self-harm, and suicide Being queer and Mormon is a TRIP! Things that leaders of the Mormon church have said about being gay are absolutely horrendous and beyond damaging...and we're about to talk about it! Sources: 1. https://newsroom.churchofjesuschrist.org/official-statement/same-gender-attraction#:~:text=Feelings%20of%20same%2Dsex%20attraction,but%20acting%20on%20it%20is. 2. https://lattergaystories.org/record/ 3. https://dailyutahchronicle.com/2019/05/25/barron-policy-change-article/
subjects: The Church Of Jesus Christ Of Latter-Day Saints

episodes.title: Ep. 2 - Sammi's Exit Story
episodes.description: Sammi shares what it's like being deeply invested in the church just to realize that you can't stand by the beliefs and history that you spent your whole life defending. CES Letter (print): https://cesletter.org/ CES Letter (audio): https://archive.org/details/CESletter Note: We are not experts--we are just humans with real-life experience.
subjects: The Church Of Jesus Christ Of Latter-Day Saints

episodes.title: Ep. 1 - Karina's Exit Story
episodes.description: TW: Mentions of sexual assault, self-harm, and suicide. Karina shares her story of growing up in Mormonism and what it's like realizing that your whole life has been a lie. CES Letter (print): https://cesletter.org/ CES Letter (audio): https://archive.org/details/CESletter Note: We are not experts--we are just humans with real-life experience.
subjects: The Church Of Jesus Christ Of Latter-Day Saints
